sentences.en: After a fruitless morning sitting at his desk he had given up.
sentences.cn: 他在书桌前徒劳地坐了一上午之后便放弃了。

sentences.en: Another half an hour passed, and the pursuit was still fruitless.
sentences.cn: 又过了半个钟头, 他们的搜索仍然毫无结果.

sentences.en: His efforts to woo her to his side proved fruitless.
sentences.cn: 他试图说服她站到自己一边的努力徒劳无功.

sentences.en: I spent a fruitless ten minutes walking up and down the high street, desperately avoiding eye contact with passers-by.
sentences.cn: 我在大街上一无所获来回走了10分钟，其间还要拼命地躲避路人的目光。

sentences.en: I traipsed home disconsolately after my fruitless, final search.
sentences.cn: 最后一次没什么指望的搜寻之后,我郁郁寡欢地拖曳着步子回家.

sentences.en: I'm sorry you've had a wasted ( ie unnecessary , fruitless ) journey.
It was a fruitless, harassing round.
sentences.cn: 这是枉费心机的, 无可奈何的循环.

sentences.en: Our efforts to persuade her were fruitless she didn't even listen.
sentences.cn: 我们怎么劝她都没用--她连听都不听.

sentences.en: So far, their search has been fruitless.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止，他们的搜寻工作毫无结果。

sentences.en: Talks have so far have been fruitless.
sentences.cn: 会谈到目前为止未见成果。

sentences.en: The next two days were spent in fruitless parleys.
sentences.cn: 其后两日是消磨于毫无结果的谈判中.

sentences.en: Their search for the plane is fruitless.
sentences.cn: 他们对飞机的搜寻是毫无结果的.

sentences.en: There will always be formal procedures which are fruitless.
sentences.cn: 总是存在无果而终的形式程序.

sentences.en: Tins took some temerity, but it was fruitless.
sentences.cn: 这件事做得有点莽撞, 但结果还是无用.

sentences.en: Trying to reverse the dictate given or negotiate better terms seems fruitless.
sentences.cn: 尝试去颠倒给出的指令或者协商更好的条件看起来是不会成功的.

words.tran_cn: 富有成效的；多产的；果实结得多的
圆润的；有果味的；果实状的
果实；结果实；[食品] 水果；成果

trans.tran_cn: 没有成果的，无益的，不结果实的，不成功的，白搭
trans.tran_en: failing to achieve what was wanted, especially after a lot of effort
